name: Thorny route
description:
Thorny route is a Visual Novel which offers a RPG elements. This means this means that the result of your actions will depend not only on your decisions, but also on the characteristics of the character.

Plot: The Lord of the northern lands dies on the battlefield and his son is going to claim his place in the Council of Lords, but everything goes not as expected. And when whole world of the little heir goes to hell, he has to figure out what he really wants.

  • Make fateful decisions and manage to survive among the intrigues and ominous turns of fate.
  • Original illustrations.
  • Original Sound Track.
  • Romantical options (later in the game)

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE CONTROL

  • Game menu: ESC
  • Grimoire: I.
  • Confirm: Enter/Space/Left Click.
  • Up/Down/Left/Right on Menus: Arrows.

Now you can try out a small demo version of the game, which will consist of three parts in the future.

If you interested in the project, consider visiting out Facebook, Twitter and other media.
